SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT PARTNER_ID, PARTNER_TITLE, PARTNER_CONTENT, PARTNER_HIT, TO_CHAR(PARTNER_DATE, 'MM/DD') PARTNER_DATE, U.USER_ID, USER_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINERT WHERE PARTNER_ID = P.PARTNER_ID) AS JOINER_CNT, TINFO_ID, PARTNER_PAY, PARTNER_CLASS, PARTNER_PERS, TO_CHAR(PARTNER_START, 'MM/DD') PARTNER_START, TO_CHAR(PARTNER_END, 'MM/DD') PARTNER_END, PARTNER_CONDITION FROM PARTNERT P, USERT U
AND PARTNER_CLASS LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND U.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND PARTNER_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND P.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
ORDER BY PARTNER_ID DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
